label.title: Label
label.description:
Label can be used to identify the person in a given context in a single
language, for example "Attn", "Contact", "Responsible", etc.

key.title: Key
key.description: Key used to identify the role of the person inside the context of the object.

name.title: Name
name.description: Complete details on the name of the person.

role.title: Role
role.description: Role or job title of the responsibilities of the person within an organization.

identities.title: Identities
identities.description:
Set of codes used to identify the person, such as ID numbers, social security,
driving licenses, etc. that can be attributed to the individual.

addresses.title: Postal Addresses
addresses.description: Regular post addresses for where information should be sent if needed.

emails.title: Email Addresses
emails.description: Electronic mail addresses that belong to the person.

avatars.title: Avatars
avatars.description: Avatars provider links to images or photos or the person.

Person.description: Person represents a human, and how to contact them electronically.
